properties.areaDesc: Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge including Mackinac Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 2:51PM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 10 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots
expected.

* WHERE...Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge
including Mackinac Island.

* WHEN...from 4 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
